QuestData.Title: The Ascended
QuestData.Description:
These shaman have spent their lives dedicated to the path of Air, Water or Fire. On your request, we will beseech the elements to Ascend them, becoming a powerful, if short lived, force to deploy in this war against the Legion.
The ritual of ascension is not to be requested lightly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a request to recruit Ascendants.

Objectives.Objective: Place a request to recruit Ascendants
